answers.answer: Good to hear all is going well for you :-) I'm 32 weeks today and although i know it's still a bit early i would love to deliver like tomorrow. Anyway good luck to you.
I feel the same way sometimes

question: So as of today im 32 weeks 4 days and im happy because i had my daughter at 32 weeks 2 days because of preeclampsia,  ive been extra careful with what i eat and drink so far, the only problems ive had so far is swelling and headaches, along with the early contractions 2weeks ago but i think im doing great i go to the dr Thursday to make sure i dont have any protein in my urine, im thankful everything is going great so far.
title: excited
